MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the TD2 and TD3 postcode area of Gordon and Lauder, affecting properties in surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:36pm. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency response team have arrived at site to investigate and repair the fault. We have been able to restore some supplies but for customers still without power our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated 7:36pm on Thursday, 4th March
